attributes.action: Stop mobile phone providers from using 5G internet in the United Kingdom
attributes.additional_details:
https://blogs.scientificamerican.com/observations/we-have-no-reason-to-believe-5g-is-safe/

https://youtu.be/ekNC0J3xx1w

https://youtu.be/X5IhKHGDKhM

The evidence says we need more investigation into 5G before even thinking about letting it into our country.
attributes.background: 5G internet is being brought out all across the United Kingdom and the rest of the world even though no real independent scientific experiments have taken place to make sure it is safe for humans and the environment. 5G has 5 times the power of 4G, which means it is 5 times as dangerous.
